Failure_Description: Multiple potholes and surface cracks observed in asphalt pavement. Severe spalling near joints. Deterioration due to freeze-thaw cycles and moisture infiltration.
Bridge bearing shows excessive corrosion and rust. Structural failure imminent. Failure likely due to water intrusion and lack of maintenance.
Culvert clogged with debris. Water backup causing flooding. Root intrusion detected. Maintenance overdue.
Street light electrical short circuit. Multiple fixtures out of service. Weathering of electrical connections. Safety hazard.
Concrete spalling and deterioration. Structural cracks. Freeze-thaw damage. Material defect due to poor initial construction.
